summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json and does not add the required favicon asset file or update frontend/index.html to reference it. As a result, the favicon fix requirements are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the missing generated favicon image file to frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png so the browser can load the favicon.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff (ADDED FILES: none), so the required PNG asset is not present based on the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure frontend/index.html references /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png with type='image/png' and sizes='32x32', and no other favicon link overrides it.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html is not modified in the diff, so there is no evidence the favicon link was added/updated or that overriding links were removed.
evidence: <file-diff>: MODIFIED FILES lists only project_state.json (no frontend/index.html)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json) unrelated to favicon asset placement or index.html favicon link changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a favicon PNG under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure frontend/index.html references it. Changing project_state.json is not requested.
